review.title: Calif Traveler
review.reviewText: Quiet, clean, spacious room and priced right. WiFi is good,  staff is friendly and helpful. Facility is clean and also smells clean.  The hotel is situated not far from the airport but not noisy and has a great view of the peninsula.  Our room a/c was noisy and had a rattling sound.  The hotel is far from nearby restaurants.

review.title: Very nice - close to airport
review.reviewText: Great experience - friendly staff, clean room.  Bed a bit bowed.

review.title: Great beds & clean, quiet rooms!
review.reviewText: The bed was comfortable and the rooms were exceptionally peaceful. The hotel is less than 2 miles to the CalTrain/Bart station, so it's really easy to access. Great for families or business travelers. I would stay here again for the convenience factor and the beds alone!
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast is additional in the mornings however, they gave us the impression that the breakfast was included with the rooms cost. Not organized.

review.title: Excellent Stay
review.reviewText: My family and I will definitely stay again. Only thing that would make it better is complementary breakfast.

review.title: Very nice hotel, peaceful rest.
review.reviewText: I missed breakfast no one told me it ended at 10 a.m. Management need to make sure guest know cut off time for breakfast. However everything else was very nice.

review.title: Nice Hotel close to the Airport
review.reviewText: Easy to find, clean room and facilities. The only thing I didn't like was that I had to ask for a breakfast coupon. When I booked the room, breakfast was included but when we checked in I didn't get a coupon. I wasn't aware that to get a free breakfast you have to provide a coupon and the next morning had to deal with explaining the waiter that breakfast was included when we booked, he said he will take care of it but still included it on our room charge. At the end the charge was removed but I don't believe I have to deal with this. The person who checked us in the night before had to explain the process and provide the coupon. Other then that everything else was perfect!

review.title: Okay stay
review.reviewText: The air conditioning is to loud needs to be fix. The room was ok. Staff was friendly overall my kids loved it.

review.title: girls weekend .....
review.reviewText: as usual this was a great stay.  close to everything and right across the street from the lagoon and bay.
review.positiveRemarks: clean, great staff, large rooms, centrally located.
review.locationRemarks: Plenty of walking and biking along the San Francisco Bay Trail.  Close to mass transit, close to plenty of great places to eat, drink, and shop.

review.title: Business hotel, convenient to the airport
review.reviewText: Clean, comfortable hotel relatively near to SFO. Quiet enough, with a king bed and reasonably-sized room. Restaurant was fine, with good service and a pleasing though limited menu. No reason not to stay here. One good thing - the free shuttle to the airport saved the cost of a cab.

review.title: Very clean hotel
review.reviewText: Family stayed there for 6 days with breakfast included. The breakfast buffet has everything you need. Fresh fruit, milk and yogurt, all kinds of bread, I loved their special-ordered omelettes. Exercise room, swimming pool, all nicely set up and amazingly clean. Rooms have  lots of space. The air conditioner is brand new. You have to try this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly staff, clean hotel, has all the facilities, free coffee and cold lemon water all day. free shuttle
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport with a beautiful ocean view walk.bike path. I love this hotel

review.title: BEST HOTEL IN SAN FRANCISCO AREA!!!!!
review.reviewText: We were so happy to arrive at this lovely hotel at the end of a busy hectic day in the city.  The bed and bedding are top of the line and so comfortable I could have stayed for a week!!!!  Staff was so helpful and pleasant and the entire property is beautiful and spotless!  It is a treasure in a very expensive city and you won't find a better hotel at a more reasonable rate in the Bay Area!!!  This will be our hotel of choice for all future visits to San Francisco!
review.positiveRemarks: Absolutely everything!!!!  BEDS WERE AWESOME!!!!  Bedding to die for!!!!
review.locationRemarks: All the city highlights !!!

review.title: San Fran Burlingame Hilton Garden Inn.
review.reviewText: Hotel shuttle bus did not even stop at the covered waiting stop area at the airport. We had to call the hotel on the courtesy phonr and then we had to wait another 30 mins for the driver to get all the way back to the to airport. We made tge mistake of waiting at the wrong covered bus stop area and when we saw the shuttle pass our station and slow down at the best one. But apparently, when the driver didn't see anyone directly under the bus stop, he didn't bother to even come to a full stop. He then just took off to other next terminal. Not happy with shuttle service the hotel provided but hotel staff was very pleasant and accomodating.

review.title: Easy, pleasant stay
review.reviewText: The room was clean. I particularly appreciated the clean bedding. The comforter cover is freshly laundered for each visitor as well as the sheets. The water was hot and the towels were soft. The staff was pleasant and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.
review.negativeRemarks: Glasses instead of paper cups in the bathroom would be nice.
review.locationRemarks: It was near the airport, but fairly quiet.

review.title: Enjoyed 1 night stay
review.reviewText: Great location, friendly staff, very good price. They should offer continental breakfast.

review.title: Pleasant stay. Wished for better view!
review.reviewText:
Very reasonable rate 15mins from dt sf. Nice setting steps from water.
Comfy full beds w/two pillows, atypical of most 3.5star hotels with 4-5pillows on each bed. No extra blanket/pillow in closet for added need like the other four 3.5-4 star hotels we stayed at the last 7 nites.

review.title: MOTHER / DAUGHTER GET AWAY !!!!
review.reviewText: We had a great stay here - AGAIN. Been in and out of San Francisco a few times during the holidays. Stay on the penninsula and take BART back and forth. Great hotel, easy location, walking trails and close shopping and dining.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff, the location, the rooms, plenty of parking.
review.locationRemarks: walking, dining, shopping.

review.title: One Day Getaway!
review.reviewText:
Clean hotel, great, attentive, friendly staff. Walking trails along bay and lagoon were perfect as the weather was
warm with only a slight breeze. Will stay at this location again. Glad it has re-opened.
review.locationRemarks: Mass transit is near and the city of Burlingame has plenty of nice restaurants and shopping.

review.title: Comfortable and quiet
review.reviewText: This hotel is near SFO airport and the Millbrae BART station. My room was comfortable and quiet, so I got a good nights sleep. No charge for parking was nice too.
review.locationRemarks: We drove about 2 miles to the BART station in Millbrae and went to SF - there is an exit for Powell Street, where we hopped on the trolley cars.

review.title: Clean rooms, comfortable beds.
review.reviewText: Typical Hilton rooms. Not too much to complain about. Very close to airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Shower curtain in tub was too long. I stepped on it while showering and fell.
review.locationRemarks: Nice town to walk around in Burlingame

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Everything was wonderful! The breakfast, the room, the staff, the location, the facility... except, when I checked in the room, I found a long hair hanging on one of the hand towls. I am sure it is only an accident/mistake, since everything else looked very clean and neat.
review.locationRemarks: It is very close to the airport, and no more than 30 mins drive to most places in SF when there is no bad traffic.

review.title: Perfect alternative to San Fran hotels
review.reviewText: We chose to stay here near the airport for the amenities like a.c. Pool, and in hotel breakfast. Best surprises were the amazing breakfasts, even tho we had to purchase it was far and above the best of our 18 day road trip. Also staff was polite relaxed kind and pleasant. This was an easy o. And off the freeway spot. Would stay there again in a minute. Family friendly!!
review.positiveRemarks: Laundry facilities, breAkfasts, good wifi, comfy beds, nice pool
review.locationRemarks: Near San Francisco and a good place to catch highways to coast. Also found Costco gas and McDonald's near.

review.title: Highly recommended
review.reviewText: Really good stay as a transit overnight with family of 4 ( 2 young wriggly kids) while looking for a break between long-haul flights. Good shuttle service, great to have the automatic phone right there at the arrivals hall and extremely good service by all the staff. The swimming pool and hot tub were great and all very clean and well serviced. Easy eating too with the in-house restaurant. Highly recommended and would stay here again

review.title: Great Value
review.reviewText: We only stayed for one night so we didn't get a chance to use the gym or eat at the restaurant. However, the rooms were well appointed, clean and quiet. It exceeded our expectations especially given the great rate we received. We would definitely stay there again.

review.title: Really nice hotel. Great location by the airport.
review.reviewText: Right near the airport which is why we used it. Of course other hotels are right there as well so ill always check prices. My son LOVED the indoor pool. Very helpful staff.

review.title: An Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: The place is clean and really pretty perfect for business travelers. I will say, though, I am surprised it doesn't really have a normal restaurant. If you check-in at night, you will have to go to the all-night diner at the Red Roof Inn next door.
review.locationRemarks: There is really nothing to do nearby. I had to drive 6 miles to find a Walgreens.

review.title: Unfriendly, harried front desk and restaurant staf
review.reviewText:
A bit unfriendly atmosphere. The maid service was friendly but room overall appeared not well cleaned.
Floors had dirt buildup and dusty furniture. View looks out onto gravel rooftop with corrugated tin structure. Additional fees for wifi AND parking.
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet at night. Easy on and off freeway. Close to airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Front desk and wait staff could be more welcoming, friendly- maybe smile.
review.locationRemarks: Near Burlingame and SF.

review.title: Nice hotel, warm, staff friendly
review.reviewText: This is a very clean, comfortable hotel. The staff are friendly and helpful.

review.title: Nice and Clean!
review.reviewText: It was a good experience. The room was clean and you get what you paid for and no less. I would recommend this hotel to friends and family.

review.title: Large room for decent price.
review.reviewText: Comfortable, clean, large room. Staff very friendly.
review.positiveRemarks: You can adjust the firmness of the bed to fit your comfort. The room was larger than expected. Nice walk way along water. No fee for parking.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast wasn't included in our room fee. Looked like a nice dinning area.
review.locationRemarks: Close enough to San Francisco without dealing with traffic and parking fees.

review.title: Good vacation
review.reviewText: It was a great experience , was my first time at this hotel. It was close to places , I want to go , but away from the city. A good place to rest and relaxation.
review.locationRemarks: I was good, close to downtown and airport .

review.title: Not worth it for the price
review.reviewText: The first room I was given had pillows on the floor and towels in the bathtub. Of course they gave me another room, but I felt inclined to look under the beds, in all the drawers and closets to see if the room was clean. The room I got was above an air conditioner or heat pump unit and it was noisy.
review.locationRemarks: convenient location to the airport and had a good view of the water and runway

review.title: Great hotel for the business traveler
review.reviewText:
Friendly, helpfull front desk and restaurant staff.
Clean, bright room.
On-time free shuttle to and from the airport

review.title: Great for families and business travelers
review.reviewText: I especially appreciate the full size refrigerator which really cut the cost of eating out and eating unhealthy food.

review.title: Very nice hotel for everyone!
review.reviewText: It is the perfect hotel for close access to the airport.

review.title: Comfortable and neat
review.reviewText: Comfortable and neat place for an economical price. Really kind staff at front desk and restaurant.

review.title: Good experience
review.reviewText: Double beds are ok, but would be more comfortable w/ queens. Had room service and breakfast and both were excellent. Kids loved the swimming pool and hot tub. Did not like that when you opened the bathroom door it blocked the main door. Overall a very nice stay.

review.title: Great hotel.
review.reviewText: Nice and clean. Everything is good and much better than most of the hotels.

review.title: Great hotel close to SFO
review.reviewText: Clean, convienent to the airport. Clean, recently remodeled.

review.title: ok place
review.reviewText:
It would have been nice to have had someone at the front
desk at checkout. Another guest just left her money at the counter and said this us whst we pay for. Not good guest service.
review.negativeRemarks: No one at the front desk
review.locationRemarks: Great burlingame location near the water

review.title: Great location for visiting SF!
review.reviewText: The ONLY bummer about this hotel was that the comforter/sheets that they have on the beds...although white, fluffy and beautiful...kept slipping off everybody at night while we slept. It was like the comforter and top sheet were in one piece. Oh...and my husband and boys had to wait for over an hour for room service to deliver a pizza. Other than that...great hotel, great location, friendly staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Pool was small and indoors, which I guess would be nice if it were foggy...but it wasn't so it would have been nice to have an outdoor pool.
review.locationRemarks: Off the freeway and set back from the airport. Wasn't bothered by noise from either locations. We were able to get to downtown SF in 30 minutes.

review.title: Very nice and convenient, too
review.reviewText: We did not stay at this hotel long...arrived late that night and only stayed one night. The hotel was very nice, very clean and had every ammenity. Very convenient to the airport and freeway.
review.locationRemarks: close to airport and freeway

review.title: Good place for a family.
review.reviewText: the staff (desk and restaurant) was outstanding in every way -- helpful and friendly to the max, even when we had dinner in the company of a 1-year-old who had little respect for the clean, spotless floor under his booster seat.

review.title: Great for anyone.
review.reviewText: I was very happy with this hotel. It was clean, very friendly and helpful people. The manager was exceptionally friendly. There was a nice walk along the water right outside the door. Great workout room; it is very rare to have free weights available. Plus, less expensive than anywhere else on a very busy weekend in SF.

review.title: Comforting stop after your flight to SFO
review.reviewText: Great hotel choice on your way down Hi 101 South. Very quiet given the vicinity of the airport. Wonderful landscaping. Gourmet breakfast - not typically included, but worth paying for.
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet place, but close to Hi 101 exits. Easy to find on your way from the airport.

review.title: Highly recommend
review.reviewText: Staff are very patient and friendly. Location is near to airport. Room is clean. Price is amazing.

review.title: Skip Breakfast
review.reviewText:
The hotel was convenient, comfortable, cost efficient. Service of hotel staff was good, the breakfast was a joke. It's not free, expensive for what you got, service was very slow and not very courteous. I was in a rush so just had a piece of toast and a cup of tea--which cost $10 and I made both myself!
But the room was nice, lobby attractive--breakfast was the only flaw.
review.locationRemarks: Near to airport, near to freeway, out of heavy traffic

review.title: Hilton Garden Inn Burlingame
review.reviewText:
Great stay even if just staying for a night,
clean room and staff was friendly.
review.locationRemarks: very close to the airport

review.title: Comfortable, convenient and affordable
review.reviewText: At a very neat, corner location, between lagoon channel and the waterfront of the East Bay; close to airport but it was really quiet stay. I like the jogging/walking trail along the bay waterfront. Next time I will definitely stay here and remember to bring my running shoes. The foods (breakfast or dinner) are extra charges. It would be nice to have complimentary breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: perfect, quiet

review.title: Good experience and price
review.reviewText: I stayed one very rainy night and did not want to go back out. I was the only one using the gym. The swimming pool is nice for kids but too small for swimming laps. The room was quiet, clean and comfortable. I was very pleased that they had a good beer on tap and breakfast was fast and the service very good on Sunday morning around 8 am with very few guests. Too bad it was raining since I would have loved to take a run along the walking/bike path along the shore. There is a path on both sides of the hotel which sits between the bay and a slough.
review.locationRemarks: nice location by walking paths, close to airport but quiet

review.title: Clean, comfy bargain.
review.reviewText: Great location if you know your way...Burlingame is a gem and the city is 15 min. away. Room is spacious and comfortable. Hilton should lose the clumsy shower-tub combo (slippery and too narrow) and install comfy showers. All else was great. Pool, spa and gym was all ours (odd)! No airport noise whatsoever.
review.locationRemarks: The 101/Broadway/Airport exits can be maddening...learn with patience.

review.title: good service
review.reviewText: nice place to stay and the satff is quite friendly.

review.title: My stay at the Hilton Garden Burlingame
review.reviewText: My stay at the Hilton Gardens was exceptional! The rooms were great for the price. They were more then I expected. Comfortable and clean rooms. The staff was more then helpful in every aspect...giving us material on sites with maps...calling cabs..extra needs etc. The food was excellent as well! My only wish was the pool being bigger...lol. Overall I would recommend the hotel to all my friends. I have already told may about it!
review.positiveRemarks: The friendly staff and clean, comfortable room. Being on the peninsula between the bay and the lagoon. Beautiful setting!
review.locationRemarks: location was good for not being right in the city! easy access to airport and the city.

review.title: Very acceptable, convenient stop!
review.reviewText: A cozy, small location to stay. Very satisfied with what it had to offer. Waiting for the shuttle took about 20 minutes.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: I would highly recommend this hotel if you're looking to stay close to the airport and want somewhere you can feel safe. The hotel was very clean, very affordable, the staff was courteous and helpful, and the shuttle service to SFO ran every 20 minutes. I would definitely stay here again.

review.title: 5 star service 3 star price
review.reviewText: their full hot made to order breakfast was incredible.
